name: Typeack
description:
Made during Global Game Jam 2019

Depending on your typing skill you'll discover plenties of easter eggs ;)

New words and modifiers will appear the more you score.

Global game jam page : https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/typeack

Made by :

- DUPRE Thibault

Using :

- Image Effect Graph : https://unitylist.com/p/hjl/Image-Effect-Graph

- Song by AdhesiveWombat - 8 Bit Adventure

hint "hello world"
